description: OpenTelemetry Collector instance for Open QuarterMaster.

configFiles./etc/oqm/infra/otel/otel-collector-confi:
# Configuration for OpenTelemetry Collector within the OQM system.
receivers:
  otlp:
    protocols:
      grpc:
        endpoint: otel-collector:4317 # What does this do?

exporters:
  jaeger:
    endpoint: host-gateway:8091
    tls:
      insecure: true

processors:
  batch:

extensions:
  health_check:

service:
  extensions: [health_check]
  pipelines:
    traces:
      receivers: [otlp]
      processors: [batch]
      exporters: [jaeger]
